name: Pit of Arcade
description:
Download Windows version for better performance and screen size. Use Alt+Enter to fullscreen that bad boy

"M" toggles Music, "N" toggles souNds.

Very arcade-y arcade game for #indiesvsgamers gamejam on GameJolt. Jetpack around as a cute creature [you are] armed with laser blaster gun and blast stuff, so stuff would know it's place.

Graphics and code: SnoutUp
https://twitter.com/SnoutUp

Music: Avaren - Tilt
https://soundcloud.com/avaren
